about-content-1: For over 10 years Moving On Productions has provided accurate, quality post-production sub-titles and translations for non-scripted film and television. We provide transcription from video or audio files to typewritten documents for documentary filmmakers, journalists, authors and reality TV producers. We also work with marketing companies and will transcribe material from focus groups.
about-content-2: We have worked with clients including; Food Network, MTV, Refinery 29 and National Geographic. We are also proud to have worked with Netflix and the team that produced Icarus, which was awarded the 2018 Academy Award for documentary film.
about-content-3: Our clients matter to us, and we always work hard to ensure that they have what they need, when they need it. Because of this, we are willing to customize formats to the exact specifications of each project. We also have depth of knowledge of the industry as our team includes several people who have worked in television production. With this unique insight into every step of the production process, we know exactly what our clients require. We know fast turnaround is a major priority, so we are deadline driven and accommodate confidentially through non-disclosure agreements.
about-content-4: We are based in New York City and Los Angeles, but we can accommodate any time zone, all over the world. We are also a New York State WBE certified business and support other minority/women owned small businesses. We'd love to work with you on your next project. Place an order here and we can get started.
date-and-time-required-for-completion: Date and Time required for completion
format-content-1: If you have audio, in any format, we can transcribe it for you. We'll take archaic technology off your hands and turn it into the written word. Need an audio cassette transcribed? Believe it or not, we can do that! We accept all forms of Wav, MP3 and MP4 files. We'll take any digital video format as well. We provide immediate upload through this site.
format-content-2: What do you want your transcript to look like? You tell us. We offer our clients full customization including time code placed at the frequency you require. Whether you need the transcript clean or verbatim and the copy being as broadcast or script style. Let us know the format of the final transcript that you prefer and we'll make it happen.
home-content-1: There are some things that still have to be done the old-fashioned way, and transcription is one of those. Although we can use new technologies to streamline the process; to do it right, and most accurately, it’s all about the human ear and eye. That’s why you need us, to automate the process for you. We'll help move your project on ... from audio to the page. Whether it's an academic report, a magazine article, a reality TV show, or a focus group. We'll use antique methods so you don't have to.
home-content-2: We understand that on any project, deadlines are important. That's why we offer extremely low rush rates. We can also offer an expedited rate with the fastest turnaround of just double the time. Give us an hour, we'll have it transcribed and back to you in 3. Place an order now for your rush project.
home-content-3: We offer services beyond transcription and can help you complete your project with subtitles, translations and even copy editing.
lisa-smith-founder-text: Lisa Smith worked for years in the fields of journalism and television productions including CBS Newspath, Extra TV and Columbia University Graduate School of Journalism. She has also worked in independent film production as a line producer and production coordinator. Moving between New York City and Los Angeles, her love of filmmaking and writing has kept her in the industry and facilitating other authors and filmmakers to tell their story is her passion. She has an MBA and a BA degree from Columbia University in English literature.
lisa-nelson-operations-manager-text: Lisa Nelson has over 20 years of experience in the transcription industry as a sales coordinator and an operations manager as well as a transcriptionist. She is incredibly detail oriented and has an eye for quality. Prior to working in the transcription industry she worked in the financial industry as an executive administrative secretary for such companies as Chase Investment services. She has a BA in music from Northern Illinois University with a electronic composition emphasis. This expertise has been incredibly helpful in the audio world of transcription where her unique skills in audio and pro-tools are heavily utilized.

name: Name
services-content-1: Whether you’re a PhD student writing a thesis, a filmmaker with a documentary to produce, an author writing a new book, a marketing strategist with audio from focus groups, or a non-scripted television show, we can take your audio and turn it into the written word. We will accept any audio or video format and create custom transcripts to your unique specifications. With or without TC, magazine style or verbatim.
services-content-2: Need a translation? We do that too. Whether it's Spanish to English, Turkish, Swedish or Swahili and so on ... We can provide translation and transcription for reasonable rates and with just as much ease as our simple transcription projects. Our translators reside internationally and are translating and transcribing from their native tongue to English. We can accomodate any language.
services-content-3: Specs for closed captioning and which software we use.
subject: Subject
